text: Down by Law is a 1986 independent movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and stars Tom Waits, John Lurie, Roberto Benigni, and Ellen Barkin. It was distributed by Island Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:1986 independent movies
title: Down by Law (movie)
